languages.text: "Видите ли вы, шерин, каких мелочных, скучных, черствых и не помнящих добра друзей послал мне Великий?"
"Do you see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"
languages.original_text: "Видите ли вы, шерин, каких мелочных, скучных, черствых и не помнящих добра друзей послал мне Великий?"

traits.locale_text: "Do see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"
"Do see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"
"Do see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"
"Do you see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"

languages.text: “你看到了吧，亲爱的？至高无上的神皇净让我结交这种小气、抠门、冷血、不讲情面的朋友，你看到了吧？”
languages.original_text: "Do you see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"

traits.locale_text: “你看到了吧，亲爱的？至高无上的神皇净让我结交这种小气、抠门、冷血、不讲情面的朋友，你看到了吧？”

languages.text: 「わかるかい、シャリーン？エグザルテッド・ワンがあたしに遣わされた、けちで、みみっちくて、冷酷で、容赦のない連中たちが」
languages.original_text: "Do you see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"

traits.locale_text: 「わかるかい、シャリーン？エグザルテッド・ワンがあたしに遣わされた、けちで、みみっちくて、冷酷で、容赦のない連中たちが」

languages.text: «¿Lo ve, shereen? ¿Ve lo mezquinos, miserables y crueles que son los amigos que el Exaltado me ha dado?».
languages.original_text: "Do you see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Lo ve, shereen? ¿Ve lo mezquinos, miserables y crueles que son los amigos que el Exaltado me ha dado?».

languages.text: « Vous voyez, shereen ? Vous voyez le genre d'amis que l'Exalté m'envoie ? Mesquins, radins, sans cœur, sans pitié... »
languages.original_text: "Do you see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous voyez, shereen ? Vous voyez le genre d'amis que l'Exalté m'envoie ? Mesquins, radins, sans cœur, sans pitié... »

languages.text: "Erkennt Ihr es, Shereen? Erkennt Ihr, wie kleinlich, knauserig, hartherzig und nachtragend die Freunde sind, die mir der Erhabene geschickt hat?"
languages.original_text: "Do you see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"

traits.locale_text: "Erkennt Ihr es, Shereen? Erkennt Ihr, wie kleinlich, knauserig, hartherzig und nachtragend die Freunde sind, die mir der Erhabene geschickt hat?"

languages.text: "Görüyor musun şirinim? Görkemli'nin bana bahşettiği kaba, tamahkâr, duygusuz, merhametsiz arkadaşları görüyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Do you see, shereen? Do you see the petty, miserly, callous, unforgiving friends the Exalted One has sent me?"

traits.locale_text: "Görüyor musun şirinim? Görkemli'nin bana bahşettiği kaba, tamahkâr, duygusuz, merhametsiz arkadaşları görüyor musun?"
